ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Four: The Endless End
ComicInfo.Series: The Adventures of Augusta Wind: The Last Story
ComicInfo.Summary:
The umbrella-girl finds herself in a world where her life as Augusta Wind never happened and she’s always been an ordinary girl named Augusta Webster. But the Story Killer means to tear this new reality apart—and the entire Storiverse with it!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Vassilis Gogtzilas (a) & Carlos Badilla (c) | 2 |
